column4: what do commercial packages have over ubuntu ; is there a features list somewhere comparing commercial distros with ubuntu :o
i'm trying to find motivation to purchasing a commercial distro over ubuntu :S
Linspire comes with click n run where you get to pay for lots of opensource software you can just as easily install through synaptic
Suse has a little bit better out of the box wireless / bluetooth support but that should change after the next version of ubuntu comes out (October timeframe)
